      • overlaps

        public boolean overlaps​(Appointment appointment1,
                        Appointment appointment2)
        checks if two appointments occur during the same time. if they do, return true. else false.
        Parameters:
        appointment1 - appointment to check against
        appointment2 - appointment to check against
        Returns:
        true if conflict, false if no conflicts

      • inBusinessHours

        public boolean inBusinessHours​(java.time.ZonedDateTime startZDT,
                               java.time.ZonedDateTime endZDT)
        checks if form dates are within business hours (assume start date is before end date)
        Parameters:
        startZDT - start of appointment time
        endZDT - end of appointment time
        Returns:
        true if in business hours, false if outside
